docs.snippet: Smartphone component maker Wistron Corp, which counts Apple Inc among its customers, has applied for permission to expand its plant in the Indian city of Bengaluru, a high-ranking regional government official said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Smartphone component maker Wistron Corp, which counts Apple Inc among its customers, has applied for permission to expand its plant in the Indian city of Bengaluru, a high-ranking regional government official said on Monday.

headline.main: Apple Partner Wistron Seeks to Expand India Smartphone Parts Plant: Government Official
headline.print_headline: Apple Partner Wistron Seeks to Expand India Smartphone Parts Plant: Government Official

docs.snippet: A search resumed Monday for 17 people reported missing after a ferry fire off the coast of Indonesia's capital that left at least 23 dead, officials said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A search resumed Monday for 17 people reported missing after a ferry fire off the coast of Indonesia's capital that left at least 23 dead, officials said.

headline.main: 17 Still Missing After Indonesia Boat Fire Kills 23
headline.print_headline: 17 Still Missing After Indonesia Boat Fire Kills 23

docs.snippet: Beijing and other cities across northern and central China were shrouded in thick smog Monday, prompting authorities to delay dozens of flights and close highways....
docs.lead_paragraph: Beijing and other cities across northern and central China were shrouded in thick smog Monday, prompting authorities to delay dozens of flights and close highways.

headline.main: China Starts 2017 Engulfed by Smog, Issues Pollution Alerts
headline.print_headline: China Starts 2017 Engulfed by Smog, Issues Pollution Alerts

docs.snippet: After a judge ruled Monday that Dylann Roof is competent to represent himself, the same jury that last month unanimously found him guilty in the slayings of nine black parishioners at a South Carolina church will return to court to begin contempla...
docs.lead_paragraph: After a judge ruled Monday that Dylann Roof is competent to represent himself, the same jury that last month unanimously found him guilty in the slayings of nine black parishioners at a South Carolina church will return to court to begin contemplating his punishment.

headline.main: With Roof as His Own Lawyer, Sentencing to Begin in Slayings
headline.print_headline: With Roof as His Own Lawyer, Sentencing to Begin in Slayings

docs.snippet: France will fight any French jihadists it finds on the battlefields of Iraq, arrest them if they return home and work to de-radicalize their children, President Francois Hollande said on a visit to Baghdad on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: France will fight any French jihadists it finds on the battlefields of Iraq, arrest them if they return home and work to de-radicalize their children, President Francois Hollande said on a visit to Baghdad on Monday.

headline.main: In Iraq, Hollande Vows to Tackle Foreign Fighters and Their Children
headline.print_headline: In Iraq, Hollande Vows to Tackle Foreign Fighters and Their Children

docs.snippet: Germany's DAX and France's CAC share indexes fell on the first trading day of 2017 on Monday, with Dialog Semiconductor, the maker of chips used in smartphones made by Apple and Samsung Electronics, featuring among the top fallers....
docs.lead_paragraph: Germany's DAX and France's CAC share indexes fell on the first trading day of 2017 on Monday, with Dialog Semiconductor, the maker of chips used in smartphones made by Apple and Samsung Electronics, featuring among the top fallers.

headline.main: German and French Share Indexes Start 2017 on a Weaker Note
headline.print_headline: German and French Share Indexes Start 2017 on a Weaker Note

docs.snippet: Three Lebanese citizens were among those killed in a New Year attack on a nightclub in Istanbul that left at least 39 people dead, Lebanon's foreign ministry said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Three Lebanese citizens were among those killed in a New Year attack on a nightclub in Istanbul that left at least 39 people dead, Lebanon's foreign ministry said.

headline.main: Three Lebanese Killed in Istanbul Attack-Foreign Ministry
headline.print_headline: Three Lebanese Killed in Istanbul Attack-Foreign Ministry

docs.snippet: The stakes confronting Republicans determined to dismantle President Barack Obama's health care law were evident in one recent encounter between an Ohio congressman and a constituent....
docs.lead_paragraph: The stakes confronting Republicans determined to dismantle President Barack Obama's health care law were evident in one recent encounter between an Ohio congressman and a constituent.

headline.main: Q&A: How Would GOP Repeal Health Care Law?
headline.print_headline: Q&A: How Would GOP Repeal Health Care Law?

docs.snippet: Heart attacks and broken hips cause much suffering and worry as people grow older. This year, Medicare wants to start changing how it pays for treatment of these life-threatening conditions, to promote quality and contain costs. Beneficiaries and ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Heart attacks and broken hips cause much suffering and worry as people grow older. This year, Medicare wants to start changing how it pays for treatment of these life-threatening conditions, to promote quality and contain costs. Beneficiaries and family members may notice a new approach.

headline.main: Medicare Launches Revamp for Heart Attacks, Hip Fractures
headline.print_headline: Medicare Launches Revamp for Heart Attacks, Hip Fractures

docs.snippet: An Islamic State car bomb killed 24 people in Baghdad's Sadr City district on Monday and the militants also attacked two police stations in the city of Samarra as Iraqi forces fought to oust the group from Mosul, its last major stronghold in Iraq....
docs.lead_paragraph: An Islamic State car bomb killed 24 people in Baghdad's Sadr City district on Monday and the militants also attacked two police stations in the city of Samarra as Iraqi forces fought to oust the group from Mosul, its last major stronghold in Iraq.

headline.main: Islamic State Kills 24 With Baghdad Car Bomb, Attack Police Stations in Samarra
headline.print_headline: Islamic State Kills 24 With Baghdad Car Bomb, Attack Police Stations in Samarra
